version.name: 1.0.1a
version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed a pad number Removed track templates from fx browser

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed crash when no track is selected Disabled mousewheel

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed a vertical menu button offset when window is docked

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Hotfix:Load RS5k with user-defined preset and handle loading samples when user-defined preset is set

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed naming issue introduced in v1.0.3

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed updating pads depending on the track selected

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Added a menu to explode pads to tracks

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed cropping drag/drop, play, and mute display

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Changed midi note filter name. Let me know on the forum if someone already saves a preset, template, etc using this script.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed path for mac, thanks fro testing it BryanChi!

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Provides a scrollable layout version script

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Added function to enhance a feature of FX Devices

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Added highlight to selected vertical bar which opens pads window

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: You can navigate the vertical tab while drag/dropping FX and move/copying a pad sample/FX now.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Fixed the problem note filter is suffixed.

version.author: Suzuki
version.changelog: Made note filter's CC passthrough default
